txt.en: Speak to Rothog about the audience.
TBD Speak to Rothog about the situation
'Are you ready? Let us get this over with.'
Talk to Rothog in Dâr Laja
TBD 'This complaint does trouble me.  I have heard Shaidal profess his innocence, so the petitioner may have some merit.  I would ask for you to follow up.'
TBD Members of the Kindred of the Coin take petitions from nobles throughout Umbar. Rothog has summoned you to his chambers to hear one specific complaint

'[placeholder], It is good of you to come to me. I may have a bit of a issue with one of my gladiators. I have received a petition from a rather bothersome noble by the name of Zarzíra Dawn-star.\n\n'I fear this may become an issue, and I may need someone of your abilities to assist. Will you come and bear witness to the proceedings?'
Members of the Kindred of the Coins take petitions from nobles throughout Umbar. Rothog has summoned you to his chambers to hear one specific complaint.
Rothog has requested your presence for a petition of one of his nobles.
Following the audience, Rothog would like a word regarding the petition.
'It was interesting to hear her need of justice in this case. However, it does seem to jog my memory of a conversation with Shaidal and his claims of innocence. Something to think on.'
Travel with Rothog to the audience

'It is good to see you again. Your work throughout these lands has spread far and wide. I have a request to make of you. Would you bear witness to a complaint that might involve one of my gladiators?'
The Gathering Storm, Part 1: An Audience with the Storm
